sentences.en: Boll rot has been attributed to a wide range of organisms.
sentences.cn: 棉铃腐烂是由分布范围广泛的微生物引起的.

sentences.en: Boll weevil : grayish weevil that lays its eggs in cotton bolls destroying the cotton.
sentences.cn: 略带灰色的象鼻虫,在棉铃上产卵以破坏棉花.

sentences.en: Bt is used as a pesticide to fight cotton boll worms, corn borers and other pests.
sentences.cn: Bt被用于消灭棉铃虫, 玉米螟和其他昆虫的杀虫剂中.

sentences.en: Certain boll shapes and absence of nectarines reduces easy avenues of penetration into the boll.
sentences.cn: 某些铃形和无蜜腺减少病菌容易进入棉铃的途径.

sentences.en: Golden crops at this time, the opening of a boll of cotton, a harvest scene.
sentences.cn: 此时五谷金黄, 棉花吐絮, 一片丰收景色.

sentences.en: He got born like the cotton in the boll or the rabbit in the pea patch.
sentences.cn: 他就象棉桃里的棉花,象豌豆地里的野兔子一样生下来了.

sentences.en: I don't take part in the boll because I don't feel at easy with those people.
sentences.cn: 我不去参加哪个晚会,因为我和那些人在一起感到不自在.

sentences.en: Is your boll on the chair or under the chair?
sentences.cn: 15你的球在椅子上还是在椅子下?

sentences.en: The cotton grows on the plant as long hairs attached to the seeds inside the boll.
sentences.cn: 棉花在植株上作为附着在种籽上的长茸毛在棉铃里生长发育.

sentences.en: The invention relates to a pesticide, in particular to a pesticide for killing cotton boll worms.
sentences.cn: 本发明涉及一种农药, 具体是一种杀死棉铃虫的农药.

sentences.en: The optimal temperatures of boll growth were 24.7 of daily mean temperature ( DMT ) and 13.7? DTD .
sentences.cn: 适宜于棉铃发育的最适日均温为 24.7 ℃,最适日温差13.7℃.

sentences.en: The price was struck by the boll.

trans.tran_en: the fruit of such plants as flax and cotton, consisting of a rounded capsule containing the seeds
